required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Identification of New Predictive Osseointegration Bio-Markers of the Prosthetic Implant in Patients With OsteoArthritis
clinical_study.official_title: Identification of New Predictive Osseointegration Bio-Markers of the Prosthetic Implant in Patients With OsteoArthritis

brief_summary.textblock: The study involves the isolation and cellular, molecular and proteomic characterization of synoviocytes, osteoblasts and chondrocytes from tissue samples obtained from patients undergoing surgery of endo or arthroplasty for osteoarthritis (Experimental Group) or interventions for other causes such as for example periarticular fracture requiring the implantation of a prosthesis (Control Group)

detailed_description.textblock: The study involves the isolation and cellular, molecular and proteomic characterization of synoviocytes, osteoblasts and chondrocytes from tissue samples obtained from patients undergoing surgery of endo or arthroplasty for osteoarthritis (Experimental Group) or interventions for other causes such as for example periarticular fracture requiring the implantation of a prosthesis (Control Group) Deeper analysis of micro Ribo Nucleic Acid (RNA) and Non Coding RNA expressed by the synoviocytes, osteoblasts and chondrocytes will be performed in order to understand their possible involvement in pathways of osteogenic differentiation, through suitable experimental in vitro models of co-cultures. In particular, investigators will focus on the cross-talk between synoviocytes and osteoblasts, cell populations involved in the post-surgical articular microenvironment and on which the osteointegration process of the joint prosthesis depends.

primary_outcome.description: expression of miRNAs and LncRNA, from synoviocytes, osteoblasts and chondrocytes detected at the time of surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Biomarkers useful for predicting the efficiency of osseointegration of the implant
secondary_outcome.description: the mRNAs and the identified proteins will be analyzed through the use of specific software, such as TargetScanPrediction.

secondary_outcome.measure: Validation of data obtained on miRNAs and lncRNAs
secondary_outcome.description: Through in vitro co-culture systems, investigators will evaluate the role of previously identified miRNAs and lncRNAs in cross-talk between osteoblasts and synoviocytes isolated from patients with osteoarthritis.

arm_group.description: Surgery for implantation of a prosthesis in case of Osteoarthritis
Surgery for implantation of a prosthesis fon non Osteoarthritis cases

intervention.intervention_name: Surgery for implantation of a prosthesis
intervention.description: Analysis of micro Ribo Nucleic Acid (RNA) expressed by the synoviocytes, osteoblasts and chondrocytes

biospec_descr.textblock: The isolated cells of synoviocytes, osteoblasts and chondrocytes from tissue samples

study_pop.textblock: Male and female patients of age >40 years undergoing surgery of endo or arthroplasty for osteoarthritis or ifor other causes requiring the implantation of a prosthesis

Hypoxia-inducible factor 1Î‘ may regulate the commitment of mesenchymal stromal cells toward angio-osteogenesis by mirna-675-5P. Cytotherapy. 2017 Dec;19(12):1412-1425. doi: 10.1016/j.jcyt.2017.09.007. Epub 2017 Oct 27.

Pelletier JP, Martel-Pelletier J, Abramson SB. Osteoarthritis, an inflammatory disease: potential implication for the selection of new therapeutic targets. Arthritis Rheum. 2001 Jun;44(6):1237-47. Review.

Marijnissen AC, Lafeber FP. Re: E. B. Hunziker. Articular cartilage repair: basic science and clinical progress. A review of the current status and prospects. Osteoarthritis and Cartilage 2002; 10:432-63. Osteoarthritis Cartilage. 2003 Apr;11(4):300-1; author reply 302-4.
Zhang M, Lygrisse K, Wang J. Role of MicroRNA in Osteoarthritis. J Arthritis. 2017 Apr;6(2). pii: 239. doi: 10.4172/2167-7921.1000239. Epub 2017 Apr 28.

patient_data.ipd_description: No Individual Patient Data sharing plan has been implemented
